source:
BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/merch/product/content-cpt-cont-it/lake/2023-09-26-09-20-20/"
STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH  = "opco/ppod/domain/merch/product/content-cpt-cont-it/stage/"
TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH  = "opco/{opco}/domain/merch/product/content-cpt-cont-it/master/"
KEY_COL="prod_id"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD = 3
IS_DELTA = False
OPCO_LST = ["ppod", "fdln", "hnfd", "stsh", "gntl", "gntc", "mrtn"]
PARAM_MERCH_PRODUCT = "usr-data-integration"

logger.info("**************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - MERCH - PRODUCT -CONTENT - CPT_CONT_IT - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("\t IS_DELTA : {0}".format(IS_DELTA))
logger.info("\t KEY_COL : {0}".format(KEY_COL))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType ,StringType 

STAGE_CNT_CPT_CONT_IT_SCHEMA = StructType([
        StructField("prod_id", IntegerType(), False),
        StructField("prim_cont_id", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("smll_cont_id", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("med_cont_id", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("lrge_cont_id", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("xlrg_cont_id", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("cpn_cont_id", IntegerType(), True),
        StructField("actv_cd", StringType(), True)
])

logger.debug("schema-defination : Defined the schema for PRODUCT:CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT.\n {0}".format(STAGE_CNT_CPT_CONT_IT_SCHEMA))

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql import functions as f


if(IS_DELTA):
    logger.info("\t PRODUCT:CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT - Delta is not supported.")
else:
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH)):
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH, recurse = True)
        logger.info("Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH))
  
    df_cpt_cont_it_stage = spark \
        .read \
        .format("parquet") \
        .schema(STAGE_CNT_CPT_CONT_IT_SCHEMA) \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH) \
        .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_dt", "src_audt_cr_dt") \
        .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_id", "src_audt_cr_id") \
        .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_dt", "src_audt_upd_dt") \
        .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_id", "src_audt_upd_id") \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_id", lit(PARAM_MERCH_PRODUCT)) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_id", lit(PARAM_MERCH_PRODUCT))

    str_cols=[colname for colname,coltype in df_cpt_cont_it_stage.dtypes if coltype=="string"] 
    for colname in str_cols:    
        df_cpt_cont_it_stage=df_cpt_cont_it_stage.withColumn(colname, f.trim(f.col(colname)))

    df_cpt_cont_it_stage\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .format("delta") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH)
    logger.info("stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH, STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH, df_cpt_cont_it_stage.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .save(path)
    logger.info("PRODUCT:CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT Master data overwritten.OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))


def init(opco):
    logger.info("Processing  MDM for CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT OPCO={0}".format(opco))
    
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco))):
        df_cpt_cont_it_master= spark \
            .read \
            .format("delta") \
            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco))
        logger.info("PRODUCT:CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_cpt_cont_it_master.count()))
        is_val_success= validate_count(df_cpt_cont_it_master,df_cpt_cont_it_stage,VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)        
        if is_val_success :
            load_master_data(df_cpt_cont_it_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco)
        else:
            logger.error("\t Failed to override master since threshold is exceding ")
            raise Exception("EXCEEDING_THRESHOLD")        
    else:
        
        load_master_data(df_cpt_cont_it_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco)


def apply_cdc(opco):
    logger.info("\t PRODUCT:CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT - Delta is not supported.OPCO={0}".format(opco))

##############################

# FULL LOAD / DELTA LOAD

##############################
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("Processing  MDM for PRODUCT:CONTENT:CPT_CONT_IT OPCO={0}, IS_DELTA={1}".format(opco,IS_DELTA))
    if(IS_DELTA):
       apply_cdc(opco)        
    else:
       init(opco)
